pages.text: $(li)The Brick can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/flower_pot)Flower Pots$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/planter)Planters$(/l), $(l)Brick Blocks$() and $(l:patchouli:utility/buzzier_bees/honey_pot)Honey Pots$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can throw them to other creatures right clicking while you have a Brick in your hand.$(br)$(li)They will inflict half of a heart of damage and will push them away too.

$(li)You can obtain Bricks smelting $(l)Clay Blocks$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/mason)Masons$(/l) will trade this item in exchange of $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)Their throw range is in the middle compared with the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/nether_brick)Nether Brick$(/l) (Lowest) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/environmental/mud_brick)Mud Brick$(/l) (Largest).
